title: Pete Prisco explains his Jaguars-Packers Super Bowl prediction (Football 07/24)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco to break down the latest NFL news, including the question marks surrounding Josh Gordon and the Browns, the decision by Odell Beckham to show up for camp, whether David Johnson will get a new contract and if we're giving Jimmy Garoppolo too much hype/credit. Then, Pete breaks down his full season predictions after picking every single NFL game on the calendar, before explaining his Jaguars and Packers Super Bowl pick.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
